name: Botego Inc. - Out of Business
tagline: Developing bots for Fortune 500 companies since 07
description:
Botego Inc, incorporated in New York, is focused on Natural Language Processing (NLP) ,technologies and provides software solutions based on its proprietary algorithms. Company has offices in New York and Istanbul,
Botego’s main products are Chatbots (Bots),Conversational UIUX, Virtual Agents, Automated E-mail Reply Agent, Document Indexing and Search, Natural Language Search.
We're not a software company that develops bots as a side business, we're the bot experts and have been in the space before Siri was :) 
Natural Language Processing engine supports English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Russian, Arabic, German, Romanian, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Finnish, Turkish.
